resources.string: This app needs notification permission to provide notifications. Please enable it in the app settings.

Notification permission is required for this app to function properly. Please enable notifications in your device settings. 

Tap `OK` to manage notification settings, or launch the app if notifications are already enabled. 

Tap `Close App` to exit.
This Clock app allows you to effortlessly set alarms, timers, and use a stopwatchâ€”all crafted with Jetpack Compose for a smooth and modern user experience.
